package delivery;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;

public class Main {
	
	// Setting the output file to write data.
	
	private static final String FILE = "C:\\Users\\Chiefan\\Documents\\delivery2.txt";
	

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		// Setting first line string.
		
		String fline = null;
		
		// Reading input file.
		
		try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("C:\\Users\\Chiefan\\Documents\\delivery1.txt"))) {
			
			// Setting first line (number of cases) to fline string.
			
			fline = br.readLine();
			
			// for loop to read lines as much as the cases mentioned above.
			
			for (int i = 1; i <= Integer.parseInt(fline); i++) {
				int orders = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
				String temp = "";
				
				// for loop to check how many orders in each case and send the delivery times to check() method to do the calculations.
				
				for (int ii = 1; ii <= orders; ii++) {
					 
					temp = temp + " " + br.readLine();
					
				}
				
				// Printing results to the console.
				
				System.out.println(i + ". " + check(temp));
				
				// Writing results to the output file.
				
				try (BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(FILE, true))) {
					bw.write(i + ". " + check(temp));
					bw.newLine();
				}
				catch (IOException e) { 
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}
			
		}
		catch (IOException e) { 
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}
	
	// check() method to do calculations on delivery times.
	
	public static String check(String ch) { 
		String[] temp1 = ch.split("\\s+");
		int total = 0;
		for (int t = 1; t < temp1.length; t++) {
			int tmp = Integer.parseInt(temp1[t]) * 2;
			total = total + tmp;
		}
		return Integer.toString(total);
		
	}

}
